job_title: Business System Analyst (Capital Market or Wealth Management)
jd: From: Abhishek Pathak, Stellar Consulting Solutions abhishek.pathak@stellarconsulting.com Reply to: abhishek.pathak@stellarconsulting.com Note: Local NJ Only and available for F2F interview Job Description: Job Title: Business System Analyst (Capital Market or Wealth Management)Location: Plaza, NJ (Onsite)Duration: 6 months (Possible extension)Exp.: 12+ yearsJob Description: We are looking for a business system analyst with good knowledge on Capital Market or Wealth Management.He/she should also have knowledge on writing and running SQLs along with good comm skills to work with customer to get the requirements, document and execute.
